cab.content: Military Secret. 1452. ... 'Prmi Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, CP. 248U co 20th January 192.1./J 81'iTEEk\L No^^9. Waziristan. Picketing troops attacked near Sorarogha on 14th. I ^^&^b^^ which ensued enemy reported to have lost 9 killed and 12 wounded, whilIn, while our casualties were 3 killed or missing and 11 wounded.
